annotation: @And( "stakeholder types a comment on a bidding" )
@And( "Close Dashboard Stakeholder goes to an open project dashboard" )
@When( "Close Dashboard Stakeholder clicks the close project button for a project" )
@When( "Stakeholder clicks dashboard button for a project" )
@Then( "Stakeholder is redirected to project dashboard page" )
@And("stakeholder sets his proposal amount to a freelancer")
@And("freelancer is informed by email that a new proposal was sent")
@And("stakeholder is informed by email that proposal was accepted")
@And("stakeholder is informed by email that proposal was rejected")
@Given( "a user open list of available projects for bidding" )
@Then( "user is redirected to project details page" )
@And( "an email with instruction on how to reset the password is sent to the user" )
@Given( "a user with a token visits the password reset page" )
@And( "user enters his new password and password confirm" )
@And( "User is redirected to thank you page" )
@When( "Admin clicks the activate button on a deactivated user" )
@When( "Admin clicks the reject button on a deactivated user" )
@Then( "User receives an email with the {string} Subject" )
